issue.title: Empty rows added to lyse dataframe, causing "Multiple items found" lookup error

content.raw: I have attached a subset of lyse.log from a few minutes before the bug through to a few minutes after. It looks as though BLACS told lyse to add the file twice. Unfortunately the BLACS log appears to only have the last half hour worth of data, so no longer contains anything from this event
content.html: I have attached a subset of lyse.log from a few minutes before the bug through to a few minutes after. It looks as though BLACS told lyse to add the file twice. Unfortunately the BLACS log appears to only have the last half hour worth of data, so no longer contains anything from this event
